title: Episode 11 ft. Layton Benton
itunes:title: Episode 11 ft. Layton Benton
description:
Angela Yee is joined by co-hosts Stephanie Santiago, Sasha DelValle and Claudia Jordan as they interview porn star Layton Benton. The ladies reveal whether or not you should pull out all your tricks the 1st time you have sex, what makes a man wack in bed, the difference between sex with white guys vs black guys, and how to have sex with someone you're not attracted to. Claudia talks about her experience with being drugged in the club, and Layton reveals who she wants to have sex with (yuck!)

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
